page.title: 17SCHOOL GAMES I BROOMFIELD
page.content: { {Long Huzz}is a ball game. Anyone can play the game but that is if you are over 4 years. You can play on the netball court. What you do is throw the tennis ball and if it hits the fence at the other end the person who threw it gets a point. If you throw the tennis ball and it hits the fence and then the other people catch it, it does not count as a catch.So the person who threw it gets another point.If you throw the tennis ball and the people at the other end catch it they would score a point. You can have as many people playing as you want. If the little ones play it they just throw it and don't have scores. The only problem with this game is, it hits teachers' cars.
